name: Chicken Rights!
description:
Human experimentation on animals too increase production have gone too far... they have created a chicken with the power to take revenge!... you play as a cigar smoking chicken who goes around beating humans, saving princess and spreading his addiction...

the game was made in 48 hours, not much testing done so.. might have some nasty bugs but i hope you enjoy...

also added a last hour feature, the challenge mode!, see how many humans it takes to take down one chicken (warning... this has no limit.. it might get severe fps drops after a few waves.. you will see why)

there is a small bug in the main menu with some resolutions where the actual buttons are a bit moved to the left
